=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
Review Date: 2020/09/29
Store: Argan Magic
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'}
Review Text: This is a 2 ounce bottle of argan oil that is commonly used for body care, either by itself or in combination with other ingredients. The bottle top is OK for dispensing the oil though it would have been better to have a special dropper top. This is a nourishing oil that is worth trying if you want a natural skin care aid.
Review Title: Pure argan oil, good for hair and skin
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Charcoal Teeth Whitening Powder,from Organic Coconut Shell and Food Grade Formula - All Natural Freshmint Flavor Tooth Whitener 30 g by Gemmaz
NUTRILUSH
['How To Use:', '1. Wet toothbrush.2. Dip brush into charcoal powder.3. Brush gently for 1-2 minutes, paying special attention to stained teeth.4. Rinse mouth well with water.', 'Cautions:', '-Charcoal can stain grout and fabrics. Protect counters, floors and clothing before using.- If you have crowns, caps or porcelain veneers, it’s possible that activated charcoal may stain them.- Keep out of reach of children.- Avoid contact with eyes. - Stop use if irritation Occurs.', 'Storage Conditions:', '(1)It should be stored in cool and dryplace. Pleaseavoid direct sunlight and do not expose to any high temperature.(2)Our teeth whitening powder can remove most of teeth stains from coffee, wine, tea and tobacco. But this product is not bleach. If your enamel is naturally discolored, this product will not help whiten, but is still an excellent natural daily toothpaste alternative!', 'Ingredients:', 'Activated Charcoal from Coconut, Calcium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cellulose Microcrystalline, DendrobiumOfficinale Kimura et Migo, Resveratrol, Natural Freshmint Flavor, Stevia']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 1.1 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'NUTRILUSH'}
These multi-colored, multi-use clips can be used for a variety of projects. This resealable bag contains 100 of the clips. The spring mechanism on the clips is of adequate strength for use in many arts and crafts applications. Having the mix of colors is useful. These are both attractive and practical, and this is a good value for this number of clips. I was provided a free sample of these for my honest, unbiased review.
Great bag of multi-colored wonder clips for crafts
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
POWERGROOMING
{'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
This is a basic nail clipping set with a clipper and file. The clipper has a nice look and a smooth cut, with a special material on its edge (feels like silicone) that makes it easy and comfortable to grip. There is a storage case with a snap to close it. If you need these simple nail clipping tools this set is fine, though a bit expensive.
A nail clipper and file with storage case
Nail Clipper Set, 19 In 1 Manicure Pedicure Ear Picking Tool Set, Tools For Nail, Cutter Kits, Includes Cuticle Remover with Portable, Nail Tools with Luxurious Travel Case
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.22 x 3.31 x 0.91 inches; 9.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '759675599820'}
This is a set of manicure and pedicure tools that includes pretty much all the clippers and instruments you would need to use. These function well and they also have an attractive design that will appeal especially to girls. The case is nice and it matches the tools. This would make a nice gift.
An attractive, flashy manicure/pedicure tool set
Eye Mask Natural Mulberry 100% Silk Super Smooth Sleep Eye Mask for Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes for Dry Eyes for Dark Circles Sleeping Travel While Camping Multi Purpose Men and Women Eye Mask
{'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 1.6 x 0.4 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
This eye mask fits comfortably and feels smooth on your face. It functions as desired for blocking out light and helping you relax and sleep. It is not substantially different than other silk eye masks I have tried, while it is not the least expensive option and it doesn't come with any box or bag to store it in.
A simple smooth silk eye mask
Wig Head Wig Stands (Purple)
BAIHONG
{'Manufacturer': 'XUCHANG BAIHONG HAIR PRODUCTS CO., LTD.'}
This package includes a pair of scalp massaging brushes along with a stretchable shower cap. The brushes have points with silicone tips so you can safely stimulate your scalp as you wash your head and hair. They feel OK, though not as good as manually massaging your scalp since the brush doesn't have the dexterity of fingers. These are nice to have although I don't expect to rely on them too much. For what is included in this package it seems reasonably priced.
Silicone tipped scalp massage brushes along with shower hair cap
AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids
AUGNORYE
{'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'}
This barber kit includes scissors, combs, and other items used by barbers. This all fits in a carry bag and would be fine for any amateur or professional hair stylist. The items are good quality and are affordably priced when you purchase them all together in this kit.
Everything you'd need for manual hair cutting
Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Cherry
{'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
This package comes with two amber glass bottles that include spray tops. The bottles are wrapped with bubble wrap so they don't crack during transit. The labels are a black color suitable for writing on with liquid chalk markers - so you would need that type of marker, which isn't included with the labels here. These bottles function as intended and are useful if you wish to avoid plastic.
Amber glass bottles with spray tops and labels
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
PRETTY FRANK
{'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
This deodorant comes in a glass jar and is made with simple, natural ingredients that are good for your skin and provide pleasant aromas. Baking soda, coconut oil, shea butter, and vitamin E are included along with some natural essential oils that add a pleasant aroma. This company offers different scent options - this one is rather flowery, with scents like ylang ylang and gardenia. This is certainly somewhat expensive for a deodorant but it is worth paying extra to get something natural with organic ingredients that won't irritate your skin or harm your health. Unlike some products that just spray on scents this item uses baking soda to help absorb odors too. This is something I would definitely suggest if you want a natural deodorant and don't mind applying something that is in a jar rather than a roll-on or spray container.
Great natural deodorant with baking soda and essential oils
Glass spray bottle-16 ounce empty bottle ounce refillable container 2 packs, suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants with mist and air flow settings
DS DOODLE SABBATH
{'Brand': 'DS DOODLE SABBATH', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable Nozzle', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '619011520959'}
This box comes with 2 blue glass spray bottles that hold 16 fluid ounces each. The spray tops have an option to adjust the type of spray and you can also use a regular bottle top on these. This includes label stickers and plastic funnels so you can pour in what you wish to and label the contents with a liquid chalk marker. The bottles work as intended and this is a reasonable price for this type of glass bottle set.
Pair of blue glass spray bottles with accessories
Obsidian Roller and Gua Sha, Face Roller, 100% Natural Obsidian Stone Set, Dual Sided Face Massager, Stimulates Blood Flow, Relieves Stress, Reduces Signs of Aging, Travel Pouch Included, Gift Box
ZEN + ORIGIN
{'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '703669115084'}
This facial massage gift box includes both a roller and a polished gua sha stone. This is just like a jade roller set but with obsidian stones. Obsidian is a stone that is good for grounding, protection, and enhancing circulation, and it functions well for facial massage. This comes in an attractive dark colored gift box and is reasonably priced for this type of set.
Cool obsidian stone facial massage roller with gua sha stone

Argan Magic

This is a 2 ounce bottle of argan oil that is commonly used for body care, either by itself or in combination with other ingredients. The bottle top is OK for dispensing the oil though it would have been better to have a special dropper top. This is a nourishing oil that is worth trying if you want a natural skin care aid.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health-Conscious:** Prioritizes natural and organic products that enhance well-being, focusing on items free from harmful additives while promoting eco-friendliness and sustainable practices.
- **Aesthetic & Practical:** Values stylish and functional items in grooming and personal care, recently expanding interests to include effective nourishing oils that support skin and hair care regimes.
- **Quality and Value-Oriented:** Continues to seek a balance between cost and performance, favoring effective mid-range products that marry aesthetic appeal with functionality, as highlighted by recent purchases of reasonably priced skincare solutions.
- **Detail-Oriented:** Demonstrates attentiveness to product instructions and safety guidelines, emphasizing the importance of maximizing functionality and supporting sustainable practices in their choices.
- **Positive User Experience:** Maintains a critical approach to assessments, reflected in an average rating of around 4.3 stars, valuing thoughtful design and satisfactory performance in all products they evaluate.
- **Varied Interests:** Engages with a broad spectrum of health-focused and personal care items, including versatile oils that serve multiple purposes in personal care routines.
- **Gift-Considerate:** Looks for functional, aesthetically pleasing products suitable as gifts, as demonstrated by their recent purchasing habits.
- **Recent Trends:** Reinforced commitment to stylish, practical, and eco-friendly solutions, with an ongoing focus on organization, minimalist lifestyle, and a budget-conscious approach favoring effective, naturally derived ingredients.
